Parameters: The time limit after which the @B_android#hardware#location#GeofenceHardware#GEOFENCE_UNCERTAIN_E@ transition should be triggered. This paramter is defined in milliseconds.
setUnknownTimer(int).Description: Set the unknown timer for this geofence.

getLongitude().Description: Returns the longitude of this geofence.

Parameters: The current state of the geofence. Can be one of @B_android#hardware#location#GeofenceHardware#GEOFENCE_ENTERED_E@, @B_android#hardware#location#GeofenceHardware#GEOFENCE_EXITED_E@, @B_android#hardware#location#GeofenceHardware#GEOFENCE_UNCERTAIN_E@.
setLastTransition(int).Description: Set the last known transition of the geofence.

getLatitude().Description: Returns the latitude of this geofence.

getLastTransition().Description: Returns the last transition of this geofence.

getUnknownTimer().Description: Returns the unknownTimer of this geofence.

getRadius().Description: Returns the radius of this geofence.

setMonitorTransitions(int).Description: Set the transitions to be monitored.

Parameters: (milliseconds) Defines the best-effort description of how soon should the callback be called when the transition associated with the Geofence is triggered. For instance, if set to 1000 millseconds with @B_android#hardware#location#GeofenceHardware#GEOFENCE_ENTERED_E@, the callback will be called 1000 milliseconds within entering the geofence.
setNotificationResponsiveness(int).Description: Set the notification responsiveness of the geofence.

createCircularGeofence(double, double, d.FullName: public static GeofenceHardwareRequest createCircularGeofence (double latitude, double longitude, double radius)

getMonitorTransitions().Description: Returns transitions monitored for this geofence.

getNotificationResponsiveness().Description: Returns the notification responsiveness of this geofence.

ClassDesc: This class represents the characteristics of the geofence. Use this in conjunction with @B_android#hardware#location#GeofenceHardware_E@ APIs.
